title: Property search
description: To search for properties of molecules
questions: What is the charge of benzene?
What is the exact mass of C16H34O
What is the rotatable bond count in C11H16O4?
CH3O5P's compound complexity?
What is the molecular weight of CH4?
Enlighten me about the flash point, tautomer count, and hydrophobicity specific to InChI=1S/C6H7NO3/c7-5(6(9)10)3-1-2-4-8/h1-4H,7H2,(H,9,10).
Examine how the heavy atom count differs in C(CC(C(=O)O)N)CC(=O)O and C(CC(C(=O)O)NC(=O)CCC(=O)O)CN=C(N)N.
What's the covalent unit count of chemical entities belonging to aminoacridines?
What are the compound complexity and bond chiral def count of molecules categorized under sulfite ester?
What labels can be used to recognize 3-(2,5-diketoimidazolidin-4-yl)propionic acid?
Can you provide information about the chemical classes attributed to InChI=1S/C3H9NO/c1-3(5)2-4/h3,5H,2,4H2,1H3?
What's CSCC1C(C(C(O1)OP(=O)(O)O)O)O's SMILES?
Show the IUPAC name of CH2O2.

title: Species search
description: To find species based on their properties
questions: Find all species with boiling point above 0
Catalog compounds wherein the logS value is lower than 29.
What are the chemical species having molecular weight around 150?
Can you list some examples of molecules exhibiting isoelectric point between 277 and 634?
Compile a roster of molecules demonstrating vapor pressure in the range of 322 to 697, and dissociation constants in the range of 181 to 656.
Enumerate the molecules categorized as ketotetrose phosphate.
Provide a roster of chemical entities employed as potassium channel blocker.
Enumerate molecules with solubility exceeding 478 and falling into the aromatic amine classification.
List the compounds displaying viscosity less than 494, employed as a disinfectant.
Provide a roster of chemical species classified as gamma-lactam and employed as EC 3.4.17.23 (angiotensin-converting enzyme 2) inhibitor.
